abstract: Insiders say secretive Congressional committee seeking ways to cut federal deficit is far from consensus, and party leaders may need to step in if they want to ensure agreement by its proposed Nov 23 deadline.
snippet: Party leaders may need to step in if a secretive Congressional committee seeking ways to cut the federal deficit is to meet its Nov. 23 deadline.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Joint Select Committee on Deficit Reduction

lead_paragraph: Party leaders may need to step in if a secretive Congressional committee seeking ways to cut the federal deficit is to meet its Nov. 23 deadline.

headline.main: Deficit Panel May Need Push, Lawmakers Say
headline.print_headline: Deficit Panel May Need Push, Lawmakers Say
headline.seo: Deficit Panel May Need Push to Meet Deadline, Lawmakers Say
